name: Turmeric Rice
keywords: gluten-free, nut-free, rice, turmeric, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups fresh or canned chicken broth
2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1 teaspoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: In a heavy saucepan with a tight-fitting lid, melt the butter and add the olive oil. Add onions and garlic and cook until wilted. Add rice and turmeric. Stir to coat.
Add broth, bay leaf, thyme, Tabasco, salt and pepper. Blend well, bring to a boil and simmer for 17 minutes. Uncover and stir with a fork. Remove bay leaf.
